content: a complimentary pattern from blackbird sycamore yarn a cuff-down sock with a knit and purl textured/ribbed pattern on the leg and foot of the sock making it stretchy and elastic available in small medium and large sizes to fit an approximate foot circumference of 6 3/4 7 1/2 or 8 1/2 17 19 21 1/2 cm add or remove pattern repeats to shorten or lengthen leg and foot size to desired fit requires 240 - 437 yds of fingering weight yarn depending on size and length desired works well with solids tonals and wildly variegated yarns
